general.copyError: Copying to clipboard did not work. Please copy the text manually.

OverviewRoute.title: Overview
OverviewRoute.description: Not much to see here, yet.

email.title: Sign in
email.description: We'll send you a verification code to your email.

confirmCode.title: You got mail!
confirmCode.description: We sent you a code to your email. Enter it below to login
confirmCode.expiringSoon: Your code will expire in less than a minute.

confirmFromDifferentDevice.title: Login failed
confirmFromDifferentDevice.description: You could not be logged in. This could either be because you are not allowed to login from different devices or the verification code is invalid or expired.

email.title: Sign up
email.description: We only need your email and you are ready to go!

mailVerification.title: You got mail!
mailVerification.description: We sent you an email with a link to confirm your email address. Please check your inbox and click on the link to continue.

editEmail.title: Edit email address?
editEmail.description: Would you like to return to the previous step and edit your email address?

VerifyEmailRoute.title: Verify your email
VerifyEmailRoute.isCodeInvalid: Sorry, but this verification code is invalid.

generateReports.title: Generate Email Reports?
generateReports.description: Would you like to create fully encrypted email reports for your mails? Only you will be able to access it. Not even we can decrypt it.

password.title: Set up your password
password.description: Please enter a safe password so that we can encrypt your data.

available.title: Encryption already enabled
available.description: You already have encryption enabled. Changing passwords is currently not supported.

AliasesRoute.title: Aliases
AliasesRoute.isInCopyMode: You are in copy mode. Click on an alias to copy it to your clipboard.

emptyState.title: Welcome to your Aliases!
emptyState.description: Create your first Alias to get started.

createCustomAlias.label: Create Custom Alias
createCustomAlias.description: You can define your own custom alias. Note that a random suffix will be added at the end to avoid duplicates.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: These settings apply to this alias only. You can either set a value manually or refer to your default settings. Note that this does change in behavior. When you set a value to refer to your default setting, the alias will always use the latest value. So when you change your default setting, the alias will automatically use the new value.

personalNotes.label: Personal Notes
personalNotes.helperText: You can enter personal notes for this alias here. Notes are encrypted.

websites.label: Websites
websites.emptyText: You haven't used this alias on any site yet.
websites.helperText: Add a website to this alias. Used to autofill.

emptyState.title: Welcome to your Reports!
emptyState.description: Here you will find your email reports. Currently, you don't have any reports. Wait until you receive an email.

delete.label: Delete Report
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this report?

aliasPreferences.title: Alias Preferences
aliasPreferences.description: Select default values for your aliases. This only affects aliases you haven't set a custom value for.

reservedAliases.title: Reserved Aliases
reservedAliases.description: Define what alias should forward to whom.

randomEmailIdMinLength.label: Minimum random alias ID length
randomEmailIdMinLength.description: The minimum length for randomly generated emails. The server will automatically increase the length if required so.

randomEmailIdChars.label: Random alias character pool
randomEmailIdChars.description: Characters that are used to generate random emails.

randomEmailIdLengthIncreaseOnPercentage.label: Percentage of used aliases
randomEmailIdLengthIncreaseOnPercentage.description: If the percentage of used random email IDs is higher than this value, the length of the random email ID will be increased. This is used to prevent spammers from guessing the email ID.

customEmailSuffixLength.label: Custom email suffix length
customEmailSuffixLength.description: The length of the custom email suffix.

customEmailSuffixChars.label: Custom email suffix character pool
customEmailSuffixChars.description: Characters that are used to generate custom email suffixes.

imageProxyStorageLifeTimeInHours.label: Image proxy storage lifetime
imageProxyStorageLifeTimeInHours.description: The lifetime of images that are stored on the server. After this time, the image will be deleted.

enableImageProxy.label: Enable image proxy
enableImageProxy.description: If enabled, images will be stored on the server and forwarded to the user. This is useful if you want to prevent the user from seeing the IP address of the server. This will only affect new images.

userEmailEnableDisposableEmails.label: Enable disposable emails for new accounts
userEmailEnableDisposableEmails.description: If enabled, users will be able to use disposable emails when creating a new account. This will only affect new accounts.

userEmailEnableOtherRelays.label: Enable other relays for new accounts
userEmailEnableOtherRelays.description: If enabled, users will be able to use other relays (such as SimpleLogin or DuckDuckGo's Email Tracking Protection) when creating a new account. This will only affect new accounts.

allowStatistics.label: Allow statistics
allowStatistics.description: If enabled, your instance will collect anonymous statistics and share them. They will only be stored locally on this instance but made public.

EnterDecryptionPassword.title: Decrypt Reports
EnterDecryptionPassword.description: Please enter your password so that your reports can de decrypted.

unavailable.title: Encryption required
unavailable.description: You need to set up encryption to use this feature.

passwordRequired.title: Password required
passwordRequired.description: Your decryption password is required to view this section.

AliasTypeIndicator.random: This is a randomly generated alias

NoSearchResults.title: Nothing found
NoSearchResults.description: We couldn't find anything for your search query. Try again with a different query.

LockNavigationContextProvider.title: Are you sure you want to leave?
LockNavigationContextProvider.description: You have unsaved changes. If you leave, your changes will be lost.

passwordShareConfirmationDialog.title: Share Password?
passwordShareConfirmationDialog.description: An extension is asking for your password. Do you want to share it? Only continue if you initiated this action.
passwordShareConfirmationDialog.warning: THIS WILL SHARE YOUR PASSWORD WITH THE EXTENSION. ALL YOUR DATA CAN BE DECRYPTED USING IT. ONLY CONTINUE IF YOU TRUST THE EXTENSION AND IF YOU INITIATED THIS REQUEST.

success.addressCopiedToClipboard: Address has been copied to your clipboard!

removeTrackers.label: Remove Trackers
removeTrackers.helperText: Remove single-pixel image trackers as well as url trackers.

createMailReports.label: Create Mail Reports
createMailReports.helperText: Create reports of emails sent to aliases. Reports are end-to-end encrypted. Only you can access them.

proxyImages.label: Proxy Images
proxyImages.helperText: Proxies images in your emails through this KleckRelay instance. This adds an extra layer of privacy. Images are loaded immediately after we receive the email. They then will be stored for some time (cache time). During that time, the image will be served from us. This means the sender has no idea you have opened the mail. After the cache time, the image is loaded from the sender, but it will be forwarded by us. This means the sender will not be able to access your IP address nor your browser data.

proxyUserAgent.label: Proxy User Agent
proxyUserAgent.helperText: An User Agent is a identifier each browser and email client sends when retrieving files, such as images. You can specify here what user agent you would like to be used when we forward it. User Agents are kept up-to-date.

expandUrlShorteners.label: Expand URL Shorteners
expandUrlShorteners.helperText: Expand shortened URLs (for example bit.ly) to their original URL. This way those services can't track you.
